Blog.post: sian...last night i 3 am offline....den i oso dunno y i fall a sleep at the com desk table.....waaaa wake up arms, back and backside pain....... luckily got clara give mi a morning call...otherwise late for tat java test....... nvm lah the java test quite hard.....i only noe how to first question only...... den after the test i go home straight.....(to sleep lah)

today clara's birthday....so we go to marina there call wat zhen fa seafood buffet after lesson....acutally i dun have enought money 1....den tat vivian say he lend mi first(tat nike boy lah) 12 bucks...expensive man....den we eat lah together with vivian, ang chun, ian, wei liang, angel, siti and tat "So xang po" lah.......we on the way got alot of jokes lah....all abt tat lame guy in my class lah(still got who???JJ lah) we tok abt today play bball with JJ.....helmy say JJ got a dunn funny or scary face.....(very funny...even the very hard to see the smile 1,martin oso kanna laugh like mad) so next time u wanna see JJ go bball court lah...u see a guy got a Funny?Scary? guy MUST be JJ.....hahaha but JJ very pro in bball sia......we kanna stunned by his moves and maybe his face expression lah......den 2day we keep mention abt JJ...hahahhaa very funny sia...exspically with tat non-stop-laughing gal, angel. dunno who say tat JJ got a small, big....errr dun say lah....later JJ angry....any way we have a gd day eating oso.....the gals hor.....like to cook food and feed guy to eat...except ang chun lah...too fat liao.....den they themself eat little...say wat later fat, later has to diet...wa kao....den suddenly angel and tat So xang po..laugh like mad sia abt JJ expression and lame joke....lolz(really very funny lor.....) haha any way i haven say anything greeting to clara...so i say here lor....hope she see it... HAPPY B'DAY....STAY YOUNG ALWAYS.......

sian....today i skip 3 leactures....just for to study for tat marketing.....luckily got ang chun help mi scan the attandance.......sian la....i skip the java, c maths and html lecture.....later dun understand liao......wa lao...i thought i got the question for marketing sure can pass 1....sian...fail liao lah...den sat got java test...but i dun have the jcreator to compile it....sian....another test fail liao lar......den 2day my bro johnson say he scare of a gal...msn dun dare to out online, put as away.....hahahha....i thought he got no fear man....hahahha...now he asking mi how to reject a gal....hahahahha

haiz....today late again......the lesson should start at 8.30...but i late for 30 min....sian....nvm...luckily the lecturer kind enought for mi to get in....today the lesson start 11 so can go home earily...but we went for play pool lolz...tat lady in the counter keep asking us to make a membership....we dun wan at first...but she keep toking and toking....so in the end we sanbo my class lamer jun jie to pay for it(no lah still got some pay money to him oso)...den i lose to every 1 when i play...sian 2day dunno wat luck......nvm tml got marketing test but i haven study....nvm i got the questions for marketing from other class....(but tat ang chun say wat diff class got diff questions..dunno it true anot??) nvm tml marketing test i sure fail 1..... dun have any SHIN XIN to pass oso.......... (-_-)

today 17th of Aug... i finally created my blog website.....(finally can relax liao).... errr.. i tok abt today wat has happen to mi....today i wake up at 9 instead 8(siao liao....late liao...)...my lesson start at 10 but i oversleep.....and i live so damn far away....(hor albert...far rite??)...it will take abt 45min for mi to reach sch......i chiong like hell....i jump out my bed and start to dressing myself.....(luckily my hair style is messy 1...so easy for mi to style my hair)... i take a look at my clock.... abt 9.30 liao..... sian.....i noe i Will late 1...so i slowly take my time.... i reach sch at abt 10.30.......but when i go in the tutorial room...hahah....got some 1 as late as mi oso...(she look like 1 actess)......nvm....the lecture didnt scold mi anyway....so i decided i late for tml for his lesson oso.....2 day i sleep in lecture hall for c maths.....AND i was sitting on the first row directly in front of her.....but i hack care her.....coz i too tire liao.... 2day tat java lesson can DIEEEEEEEE...dun understand....... den satday got test some more....
